<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spectacles of Inquiry](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2316)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 147 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Anything viewed through these thin spectacles looks crisp and clear, and the earpieces accentuate sounds around you. You gain a +2 item bonus to Perception checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** The spectacles key in on someone to show you their social cues in perfect clarity. Choose a creature you can see. You gain a +3 item bonus on Perception checks you make to use [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) against that creature. This benefit lasts until you Activate the item again in this way.

 If you’re an [investigator](/Classes.aspx?ID=59), you can use this activation as part of the [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=2813) action (even if you’re doing it as a free action). Alternatively, you can use it as part of the [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=2811) activity, even though you can’t see the creature. You must choose the same creature you chose for Devise a Stratagem or Pursue a Lead.

**Craft Requirements** You are an investigator.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spectacles of Inquiry
